articles.content: Viktor Axelsen stretched to his right to return a half-smash from HS Prannoy. On any other day, the world No 1 from Denmark would have made the shot without much effort. But at the Royal Arena in Cop… [+6479 chars]

articles.title: Mason Greenwood leaves Man United to join Getafe on loan - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Mason Greenwood has joined Getafe on loan from Manchester United, the clubs have confirmed.
articles.content:
Mason Greenwood has joined Getafe on loan from Manchester United, the clubs have confirmed.

articles.title: Gukesh Ends Anand's 37-Year Reign As India's Official Number 1 - Chess.com
